thread.title: Graham against military parade with "Soviet style hardware display"

title: Graham against military parade with "Soviet style hardware display"
text:
Graham against military parade with "Soviet style hardware display" Wednesday, February 07, 2018 - 00:41 
Republican Senator Lindsey Graham says he would support a military parade if it honored service members, but that he'd be against a ''Soviet style hardware display.'' Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Republican Senator Lindsey Graham says he would support a military parade if it honored service members, but that he'd be against a "Soviet style hardware display." Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
